title: Druid
content:
ruid is a Class in Baldur's Gate 3 (BG3). The Druid's primary Ability is Wisdom, their saving throw proficiencies are Intelligence and Wisdom and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons, Light Armour, Medium Armour, and Shields.

The Druid class provides a lot of versatility, making it an excellent support for the group with defensive and healing Spells. Druids can select a Druid Circle as a subclass, making an impact on the interactions within the game.
